cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("set")

	SET("field.to.set").COPY_FROM("src.field").IGNORE_EMPTY(true)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE("value").OVERRIDE(false)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE("{{{other.field}}}").OVERRIDE(false)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE(1).OVERRIDE(false)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE(1.5).OVERRIDE(false)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE(true).OVERRIDE(false)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE(false).OVERRIDE(false)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE([]int{
		1, 2, 3, 4,
	}).OVERRIDE(true)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE(false).IF(`ctx.field != null && (ctx.field != 0 || ctx.field != '')`)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE(false).IF(` ctx.field != null && (ctx.field != 0 || ctx.field != '') `)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE(false).IF(`ctx.field != null && (
  ctx.field != 0 ||
  ctx.field != ''
)`)
	SET("field.to.set").VALUE(false).IF(`
        ctx.field != null && (
          ctx.field != 0 ||
          ctx.field != ''
        )
    `)

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: set
processors:
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_4516dee2
      field: field.to.set
      copy_from: src.field
      ignore_empty_value: true
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_5306be01
      field: field.to.set
      value: value
      override: false
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_0a31392c
      field: field.to.set
      value: '{{{other.field}}}'
      override: false
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_f037cf65
      field: field.to.set
      value: 1
      override: false
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_b347fb14
      field: field.to.set
      value: 1.5
      override: false
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_8021ae26
      field: field.to.set
      value: true
      override: false
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_0489c955
      field: field.to.set
      value: false
      override: false
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_486e9173
      field: field.to.set
      value:
        - 1
        - 2
        - 3
        - 4
      override: true
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_954740a1
      if: ctx.field != null && (ctx.field != 0 || ctx.field != '')
      field: field.to.set
      value: false
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_92473be8
      if: ctx.field != null && (ctx.field != 0 || ctx.field != '')
      field: field.to.set
      value: false
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_ff910fa7
      if: |-
        ctx.field != null && (
          ctx.field != 0 ||
          ctx.field != ''
        )
      field: field.to.set
      value: false
  - set:
      tag: set_field_to_set_0091113a
      if: |-
        ctx.field != null && (
          ctx.field != 0 ||
          ctx.field != ''
        )
      field: field.to.set
      value: false
